message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $120. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $70?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I understand your budget, $70 is significantly below its value.  Could you meet me halfway at $95?
I understand your concerns about the value of the product, but $95 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $85?
